title: Kare no Niwa ni Saku Hana
sinopse:
Several stories, part of Miamoto Kano’s "Moony Trilogy" (Cherry Blossom Dorm Trilogy) that revolves around a men's dormitory in a regional university:

1. Flower That Blooms In His Garden
   2-4) Frost
2. I Want to Gaze at You
3. The Reason We're Here
4. Bird on the 12th Floor
